mods.abstract: Page 64 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [184] shows a panoramic photograph of pigs grazing in a field. Three men herding pigs with rolling pastures in the background.; Photograph 2 [185] shows removed organs with evidence of hog cholera/swine typhoid. Probably from North Louisiana Research Station at Calhoun.; Photograph 3 [186] shows removed organs with evidence of hog cholera/swine typhoid. Probably from North Louisiana Research Station at Calhoun.
